org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor

Class AccDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • org.svvrl.goal.gui.UIDialog
                • org.svvrl.goal.gui.editor.AccDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, AutomatonListener, AccSelectionListener, TabSwitchedListener

    public class AccDialog
extends UIDialog
implements TabSwitchedListener, AccSelectionListener, AutomatonListener
    An AccDialog is a dialog containing an editor suitable for editing the acceptance condition of the active automaton in a specific GOAL window.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setReadOnly

        public void setReadOnly(boolean b)
        Sets true if the owner automaton of the current acceptance condition in this dialog is read only. When the automaton is read only, this dialog should disable all editing actions.
        Parameters:
        b - true if the owner automaton of the current acceptance condition in this dialog is read only

      • toggleSelection

        public void toggleSelection(GraphicComponent comp)
        Toggle the selection of a state or a transition. If it is an alternating connector selected, it will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        comp - a state or a transition becoming selected or unselected

      • getDialog

        public static AccDialog getDialog(Window win)
        Returns the AccDialog object for a GOAL window.
        Parameters:
        win - a GOAL window
        Returns:
        the AccDialog object for win

      • tabSwitched

        public void tabSwitched(Tab tab)
        Description copied from interface: TabSwitchedListener
        Invoked when the active tab in a GOAL window has been switched. Note that the new active tab may be null because there is no tab in the window.
        Specified by:
        tabSwitched in interface TabSwitchedListener
        Parameters:
        tab - the new active tab

      • reload

        public void reload()
        Reloads the acceptance condition from the active automaton.
